name: Waggly Fish
description:
THE GAME

Waggly Fish is a 2D side-scrolling casual game about a little fish avoiding underwater dangers. The game features simple gameplay, cartoon graphics, minimal UI and endless enemy waves. Tap to jump, avoid dangers, gather pick ups and gain high scores!

CONTROLS

Tap screen: Move up

FEATURES

- The game less than 10 MB
- Tap the screen to jump upward 
- Gather pick ups to gain jump points
- Jump out of water when you have enough jump points
- Beware red sharp-toothed fishes and fishing hooks
- Avoid going too deep down
- Keep playing until the game is over
- Retry!
